lines.text: Lowenthal, you know it is a historical fact that the Jews are the basis of our misfotunes.
Of course.
You agree?
Of course. The Jews and the bicycle riders.
The bicycle riders? Why the bicycle riders?
Why the Jews?
How old are you?
Sixteen.

Adolescence. What is adolescence? Adolescence is a time when people worry about things there's no need to worry about. Sixteen... I promise you, at seventeen you will be even more charming than you are now. At twenty-one, you will be gorgeous. And at twenty-five... devastating! And I won't stand any argument!
I like people; if you look for it, you can find something good in anybody.
If you can't get what you want, you damn well better settle for what you can get.
Everybody on this ship is in love. Love me whether or not I love you. Love me whether I am fit to love. Love me whether I am able to love. Even is there is no such thing as love. Love me.
I was in Vercaruz trying to teach them greasers to play ball. Man, they tried to poison me. You know, I had the runs for three weeks.
How interesting. I'd like to hear more about it.
Doesn't it bother you that you and that little man are the only two Germans not at the Captain's Table?
white men hate black men, Muslims hate Buddhists-that's the way it goes. There's prejudice everywhere. It does no good to give it back. You have got to use your noogin'.
Tell me. Wouldn't it unnverve you to have an affair with me?
I think that David thinks a woman should follow three paces behind with slippers.
Men usually do.

[Drunk]
You know what I think?
No.
I think you're a sawed-off intellectual.
Do you know what they say in Mexico? Mexicans loathe the Americans, hate the Spaniards, distrust the English, admire the French and love the Germans.
That is all very nice. I am glad they say those things but, as far as I am concerned, after a few weeks in Mexico, you can keep the Mexicans too.
